title: Drawing, "Design for Boxes with 1 Door Unit", 1933
medium: Graphite, color pencil on tracing paper
inscribed:
Measurements to left and below design. 
Lower right, (?) # 3689./ BOXES with 1 DOOR/.UNIT.
To left: JB trademark/ N.Y. March 19th 1933/JB (initials)/SCALE: 1" = 1'0".
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Configuration from left to right in descending order: no. 7, 14'; no. 6, 12 1/2'; no. 5, 11 1/2'; no. 4, 10'; no. 3, 8 1/2'; no. 2, 7'; no. 1 5 1/2'. The door (#7) and boxes form a step-like design on a horizontal base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Boxes with 1 Door Unit", 1933.
1933. Graphite, color pencil on tracing paper. Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 2003-15-7.
